adventures.title: Breithorn, Pennine Alps
adventures.description: Climbing Breithorn you will receive views that are remarkable. There is so much to see, including, the Matterhorn (4,478m), the Gendarm (4,106m), Monte Rosa (4,634m), the Roccia Nera (4,075m), among several more peaks and glaciers.

comments.name: Tom
comments.comment: If there is a majestic view, it must be from here!

adventures.title: Lascar Volcano, Chile
adventures.description: Lascar volcano is one of the most active volcanoes in this mountain range. Recently, it erupted in 2015. The strongest eruption of the last decades occurred in 1993. Situated near San Pedro de Atacama, Lascar Volcano is one of the most climbed high altitude mountains in the world.

comments.name: Monica and Jeff
comments.comment: Absolutely beautiful. We were totally blown away by the scenery.

adventures.title: Rock Climbing, Tara
adventures.description: The Tara Mountains are a massif in Serbia, on the border with Bosnia. The massif, which has been declared a National Park, belongs to the Dinaric Alps and its highest peak reaches an altitude of 1,591 meters. Across these mountains, runs the beautiful Drina River, where weâ€™ll be able to enjoy kayaking on the first day of the program.
